                       throws CacheReloadException

      • getBundleKey

        public static String getBundleKey(List<String> _names,
                  Class<?> _bundleclass)
                           throws EFapsException
        this static method is used to get from a List of Names representing StaticSources the a key to Bundle. The method first checks if the a key for the List already exist and if exists returns the key. Otherwise a new Key will be created using the method createNewKey(List, Class)
        Parameters:
        _names - List of Names representing StaticSources
        _bundleclass - The Class that will be instantiated in the case that the key did not already exist
        Returns:
        the Key to a Bundle
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error

      • containsKey

        public static boolean containsKey(String _key)
        Does a Bundle for the Key exist.
        Parameters:
        _key - key to search for
        Returns:
        true if found, else false

      • getBundle

        public static BundleInterface getBundle(String _key)
        Get a Bundle for a specific key.
        Parameters:
        _key - key to get the Bundle for
        Returns:
        the bundle if exist, else null
